HeroSection.subtitle: "Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work"
HeroSection.author: Aristotle

Deporturnos.name: Deporturnos
Deporturnos.description: High-performance platform for comprehensive sports center management.
Deporturnos.about:
A robust Full Stack application designed to handle complex reservation logic. 
Key Highlights: 
• Backend engineered with Spring Boot & JWT security. 
• Resilience verified using k6 (Stress & Spike testing) to ensure stability under high concurrency. 
• Containerized with Docker for consistent deployment.

ProductManager.name: Product Manager API
ProductManager.description: Scalable RESTful API designed for advanced product lifecycle management.
ProductManager.about: A backend-focused project demonstrating Clean Architecture and testing best practices. Features include robust CRUD operations, JWT authentication, image handling, and automated testing. Fully documented with Swagger/OpenAPI.

Poui.name: Poui Aromas
Poui.description: E-commerce landing page focused on brand identity and user experience.
Poui.about: A modern, responsive Frontend solution for an aromatherapy business. Features an elegant UI/UX design, an interactive product catalog, and seamless contact integration to drive sales conversion.

TaskList.name: Smart TaskList
TaskList.description: Productivity tool focused on state management and efficiency.
TaskList.about: React-based application demonstrating efficient state management, local storage persistence, and dynamic routing. Minimalist interface with clean, maintainable code under the hood.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.d0: Hello! I'm Joaquín Dario Olivero, a Software Developer focused on Backend architecture and system performance.
AboutSection.d1: I specialize in building Java & Spring Boot applications that are not just functional, but scalable and resilient. My recent work focuses on implementing Load Testing strategies (k6) to ensure APIs can handle real-world traffic without failure.
AboutSection.d2: While my core strength is the Backend, I possess strong Full Stack capabilities (React, Next.js), allowing me to understand the complete product lifecycle and collaborate effectively with Frontend teams.

SkillsSection.title: Tech Stack & Tools
SkillsSection.defaultDescription: Hover over a tech to see how I use it!
SkillsSection.Java: Primary language for building robust, enterprise-grade backend systems.
SkillsSection.Docker: Essential for containerization, ensuring consistent environments across development and production.
SkillsSection.SpringBoot: My preferred framework for creating production-ready microservices and APIs.
SkillsSection.PostgreSQL: Go-to relational database for complex data modeling and data integrity.
SkillsSection.MongoDB: Used for flexible, document-oriented data structures when SQL fits less efficiently.
SkillsSection.NextJS: Utilized for server-side rendering (SSR) and building SEO-friendly web applications.
SkillsSection.TypeScript: Ensures type safety and code maintainability across JavaScript projects.
SkillsSection.React: Library of choice for building dynamic, responsive, and modern user interfaces.
